verses.text: When the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* turned \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the \w captivity|strong="H7870"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, we were like them that \w dream|strong="H2492"\w*.\f + \fr 126.1 \ft turned…: Heb. returned the returning\f*

Then was our \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with \w laughter|strong="H7814"\w*, and our \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* with \w singing|strong="H7440"\w*: then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* they among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* great \w things|strong="H1431"\w* for them.\f + \fr 126.2 \ft hath…: Heb. hath magnified to do with them\f*
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* great \w things|strong="H1431"\w* for us; \add whereof\add* we are \w glad|strong="H8056"\w*.
Turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w* our \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, as the \w streams|strong="H0650"\w* in the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*.
They that \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* in \w tears|strong="H1832"\w* shall \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* in \w joy|strong="H7440"\w*.\f + \fr 126.5 \ft joy: or, singing\f*

He that \w goeth|strong="H3212"\w* \w forth|strong="H1980"\w* and \w weepeth|strong="H1058"\w*, \w bearing|strong="H5375"\w* \w precious|strong="H4901"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, shall \w doubtless|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* again with \w rejoicing|strong="H7440"\w*, \w bringing|strong="H5375"\w* his \w sheaves|strong="H0485"\w* \add with him\add*.\f + \fr 126.6 \ft precious…: or, seed basket\f*
